org.esupportail.commons.services.database
Interface DatabaseManagerStore

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDatabaseManagerStore, BasicDatabaseManagerStoreImpl, EmptyDatabaseManagerStoreImpl
public interface DatabaseManagerStore
extends java.io.Serializable

The interface of the database manager stores.

Method Summary
 void begin()
          Begin a transaction for all the database managers.
 void close()
          Close the database connections, rollback the current transaction if any.
 void create()
          Create the database structures.
 void end(boolean commit)
          End the current transaction.
 void open()
          Open the database connections.
 void test()
          Test the database connections.
 void update()
          Update the database structures.
